abstracts.cdata!:
This First Structural Adjustment Credit
            Project supports the Government's structural adjustment
            program which is directed toward establishing an incentive
            framework that will stimulate growth, encourage savings and
            investments, and improve the balance of payments. In
            addition, attention is directed towards improving resource
            use, particularly in the public sector, and direct resources
            to key areas of adjustment, while ensuring fiscal and
            monetary stability. The incentive framework to be
            established will focus on trade liberalization, cocoa sector
            policies, public expenditure policy, state owned enterprise
            reform, and public sector management.
